The [93mdoping[0m of [93mSm[0m [93meffectively[0m [93mregulates[0m the [93mband[0m [93mstructure[0m of [93mFeTiO[0m [93m3[0m , [93msignificantly[0m [93mpromoting[0m the [93mseparation[0m of [93mcarriers[0m. At the [93msame[0m [93mtime[0m, the [93mZ[0m-[93mscheme[0m [93mheterojunction[0m [93mformed[0m with [93mWO[0m [93m3[0m [93mfurther[0m [93moptimizes[0m the [93mcharge[0m [93mtransfer[0m [91mpath[0m, not only [93mgreatly[0m [93mimproving[0m the [93mcharge[0m [93mcarrier[0m [93mseparation[0m [93mefficiency[0m but [93malso[0m [93msignificantly[0m [93menhancing[0m the [93mredox[0m [93mcapability[0m of the [93mphotocatalyst[0m. The [93mdensity[0m [93mfunctional[0m [93mtheory[0m ([93mDFT[0m) [93mcalculation[0m [93mresults[0m [93mshow[0m that the [93mstrong[0m [93minternal[0m [93melectric[0m [93mfield[0m ([93mIEF[0m) [93mformed[0m by [93mSF[0m/[93mW[0m [93mcomposite[0m [93mprovides[0m an [93mefficient[0m [93mtransfer[0m [93mchannel[0m for [93mphotogenerated[0m [93melectrons[0m, [93mpromoting[0m the [93mcyclical[0m [93mtransformation[0m of [93mFe[0m [93m2[0m+ /[93mFe[0m [93m3[0m+ in the [93mphoto[0m-[93mFenton[0m [93mprocess[0m, [93mthereby[0m [93mcontinuously[0m [93mgenerating[0m [93mmore[0m [93mreactive[0m [93mspecies[0m. [93mTherefore[0m, at the [93moptimal[0m [93mdoping[0m [93mratio[0m, the [93mphoto[0m-[93mFenton[0m [93mdegradation[0m [93mefficiency[0m of the [93mSF[0m/[93mW[0m for [93mTetracycline[0m [93mhydrochloride[0m ([93mTCH[0m) [93mreaches[0m [93m95[0m.[93m6[0m% within [93m20[0m [93mmin[0m. [93mMoreover[0m, through [93mLiquid[0m [93mChromatograph[0m [93mMass[0m [93mSpectrometer[0m ([93mLC[0m-[93mMS[0m) and [93mToxicity[0m [93mEstimation[0m [92mSoftware[0m [92mTool[0m ([93mT[0m.[93mE[0m.[93mS[0m.[93mT[0m.) [93manalysis[0m [93mled[0m to the [93mproposal[0m of [93mpotential[0m [93mdegradation[0m [91mpathways[0m and an [93mevaluation[0m of the [93mtoxicity[0m of the [93mresulting[0m [93mproducts[0m.
- [93mStructural[0m [93mbasis[0m of [93mmenaquinone[0m [93mreduction[0m by [93msuccinate[0m [93mdehydrogenase[0m from [93mChloroflexus[0m [93maurantiacus[0m.: [93mSuccinate[0m: [93mmenaquinone[0m [93moxidoreductase[0m ([93mSQR[0m) [93mcouples[0m the [93moxidation[0m of [93msuccinate[0m with the [93mreduction[0m of [93mmenaquinone[0m ([93mMK[0m) as [93mpart[0m of the [93mTCA[0m [93mcycle[0m and the [93maerobic[0m [93mrespiratory[0m [93mchain[0m in [93mMK[0m-[93mcontaining[0m [93mbacteria[0m and [93marchaea[0m. [93mDespite[0m its [93msignificance[0m, [93mquestions[0m [93mpersist[0m [93mregarding[0m the [93melectron[0m and [93mproton[0m [93mtransfer[0m [93mmechanisms[0m that [93mdrive[0m the [93mendergonic[0m [93mMK[0m [93mreduction[0m by [93msuccinate[0m. In this [93mstudy[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mdetermine[0m [93mcryo[0m-[93mEM[0m [93mstructures[0m of [93msuccinate[0m [93mdehydrogenase[0m ([93mSDH[0m) from [93mChloroflexus[0m [93maurantiacus[0m ([93mCaSDH[0m), a [93mfacultative[0m [93mfilamentous[0m [93manoxygenic[0m [93mphototroph[0m ([93mFAP[0m) that [93mforms[0m [93mone[0m of the [93mearliest[0m [93mbranches[0m of [93mphotosynthetic[0m [93mbacteria[0m. The [93mstructures[0m of [93mtrimeric[0m [93mCaSDH[0m, [93mresolved[0m in [93mboth[0m [93mapo[0m- and [93mMK[0m-[93mbound[0m [93mforms[0m, [93mreveal[0m a [93msingle[0m [93mmembrane[0m-[93manchoring[0m [93msubunit[0m [93mcontaining[0m [93mtwo[0m [93mb[0m-[93mtype[0m [93mhemes[0m, a [93mcanonical[0m [93mQ[0m [93mP[0m [93msite[0m, and a [93mQ[0m [93mD[0m [93msite[0m with [93matypical[0m [93mlocation[0m, [93mconfiguration[0m and [93mspecificity[0m, [93meach[0m [93mbound[0m to [93mMK[0m [93mmolecules[0m. [93mUsing[0m [93mstructural[0m [93manalysis[0m, [93mEPR[0m, and [93menzymatic[0m [93massays[0m, [93mwe[0m [93muncover[0m [93melectron[0m [93mtransfer[0m [91mpathways[0m [93mconnecting[0m [93msuccinate[0m [93moxidation[0m to [93mMK[0m [93mreduction[0m at the [93mQ[0m [93mP[0m and [93mQ[0m [93mD[0m [93msites[0m. These [93mfindings[0m [93mprovide[0m [93mstructural[0m [93minsights[0m into the [93melectron[0m and [93mproton[0m [93mtransfer[0m [93mmechanisms[0m of [93mMK[0m-[93mdependent[0m [93mdiheme[0m [93mSQRs[0m and [93mestablish[0m a [93mfoundation[0m for [93mstructure[0m-[93mbased[0m [93minhibitor[0m [92mdesign[0m and [93mantibacterial[0m [93mdrug[0m [93mdevelopment[0m [93mtargeting[0m these [93menzymes[0m.

The [93msmall[0m [93miron[0m-[93msulfur[0m-[93mbinding[0m [93mbacterial[0m [93mferredoxins[0m were [93mlikely[0m among these [93mfirst[0m [93mproteins[0m. [93mEmbedded[0m within the [93mferredoxin[0m [93msequence[0m and [93mstructure[0m is a [93msymmetry[0m that [93mpoints[0m to an [93mancient[0m [93mgene[0m [93mduplication[0m [93mevent[0m. [93mLittle[0m is [93munderstood[0m about the [93mnature[0m of [93mferredoxins[0m [93mprior[0m to this [93mduplication[0m [93mevent[0m or what [93menvironmental[0m [93mfactors[0m [93mmay[0m [93mhave[0m [93mdriven[0m the [93mselection[0m for [93mmore[0m [93mcomplex[0m [93mforms[0m. The [93mdeep[0m-[93mtime[0m [93mmolecular[0m [93mhistory[0m of [93mferredoxins[0m [93mgoes[0m [93mback[0m [93mbillions[0m of [93myears[0m and [93mcannot[0m be [93mreconstructed[0m by [93mphylogenetic[0m [93manalyses[0m [93mbased[0m on [93mamino[0m [93macid[0m [93msequences[0m. [93mHere[0m, [93mwe[0m [93muse[0m [93mstructure[0m-[93mguided[0m [93mprotein[0m [92mdesign[0m to [92mmodel[0m a [93mfossil[0m [93mhalf[0m-[93mferredoxin[0m [93mstage[0m in the [93mevolution[0m of this [93mfold[0m, the [93msemidoxins[0m, and [93mtheir[0m [93msymmetric[0m [93mfull[0m-[93mlength[0m [93mcounterparts[0m, the [93msymdoxins[0m. [93mSemidoxin[0m [92mdesigns[0m [93mhomodimerize[0m, [93mexhibiting[0m [93mstructural[0m, [93mthermodynamic[0m, and [93melectrochemical[0m [93mbehaviors[0m in [93mmost[0m [93mcases[0m [93midentical[0m to [93mcognate[0m [93msymdoxins[0m. [93mHowever[0m, the [93msemi[0m- and [93msymdoxin[0m [93mfossil[0m [93mstages[0m [93mbehave[0m [93mdifferently[0m when [93mincorporated[0m into an in [93mvivo[0m [93melectron[0m [93mtransfer[0m [93mcomplementation[0m [93massay[0m. [93mBoth[0m [93mcan[0m [93msupport[0m [93mbacterial[0m [93mgrowth[0m [93mdependent[0m on [93mprotein[0m [93mexpression[0m. [93mGrowth[0m [93mrates[0m of [93mbacteria[0m [93mexpressing[0m the [93msemidoxins[0m are [93mmuch[0m [93mmore[0m [93msensitive[0m to [93moxygen[0m than those of [93mbacteria[0m [93mexpressing[0m [93msymdoxins[0m. [93mMotivated[0m by the in [93mvivo[0m [93mfunctionality[0m of [93mdesigned[0m [93msemidoxins[0m, [93mwe[0m [93midentified[0m [93mputative[0m [93mnaturally[0m [93moccurring[0m [93msemidoxins[0m in [93mextant[0m [93manaerobic[0m [93mmicroorganisms[0m. This is [93mconsistent[0m with the [93mobserved[0m in [93mvivo[0m [93moxygen[0m [93msensitivity[0m of the [93msemidoxin[0m [92mdesigns[0m. [93mOne[0m [93mnatural[0m [93msemidoxin[0m is [93mshown[0m to be [93mfolded[0m and [93mredox[0m [93mactive[0m. [93mHowever[0m, it [93mexists[0m as a [93mmixture[0m of [93mmonomers[0m and [93mdimers[0m, [93msuggesting[0m a [93mpotential[0m [93mconnection[0m between [93msemidoxins[0m and even [93msimpler[0m [93msingle[0m [93miron[0m-[93msulfur[0m [93mcluster[0m-[93mbinding[0m [93mpeptides[0m.
